name: Omurice Waltz
effect: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 1500s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
description: Kuki Shinobu's specialty. The soft egg skin almost seems to dance upon a stage made from sauce, with fluffy rice wrapped under its swaying skirt. This would even be a match for the work of Uyuu Restaurant's head chef. Truly, Shinobu's chef license was not earned in vain.
